title: Team Profile Generator
description: This Node.js command-line application takes in information about employees on a software engineering team and generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person

title: Daily Planner App
description: The Work Day Scheduler is a simple calendar application designed for scheduling your workday. It allows users to save hourly appointments or tasks in a user-friendly interface. The application uses local storage to persist the data, so the users' inputs are saved even after the page is refreshed.

title: Password Generator
description: This application allows employees to generate random passwords based on selected criteria. It's designed to run in a web browser and features a dynamic HTML and CSS interface powered by JavaScript.
